1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa`eed al-Khudri that:The Messenger of Allah said: "No two people should converse while relieving themselves, each of them looking at the private parts of the other, for Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, hates that." (Da'if) Other chains with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ الاِجْتِمَاعِ، عَلَى الْخَلاَءِ وَالْحَدِيثِ عِنْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of gathering or talking at the toilet
